title: Portfolio Website
description: The elegant website you are currently looking at! A static website hosted with GitHub and used to showcase myself and my relevant skills.

title: Checkpoint
description: A beautiful website to be presented at the 2025 Rhodes symposium. Its primary use to facilitate the reservation of school equipment. Collaborators: AJ, Son, Dimash, Enkhee, Jules.

title: VR Casino
description: A virtual reality casino made using Unity XR. Put it all on black! Collaborators: Mohid, Crosby, Umer.

title: Blackjack
description: Play blackjack in the terminal/cmd. Do you hit on 17?

title: Bloodborne Hangman
description: Play hangman in the terminal/cmd. Features a Bloodborne inspired set of words! Fear the old blood!
